item.description:
address is 89 Davis Ave, Cranston off Pontiac Ave, the house with the huge tree on the right...cant miss it.    First, leave food at my house then convoy car ride to parking lot between Cranston Police, or ride the streets in my neighborhood..... Easy ride to West Warwick on the bike path, and return.  Quick drive back to my house and we have a BBQ that can't be beat.... I have grill, deck and back yard, some chairs... bring one chair each please. shaded by trees partly. nice place to laugh and have fun. I have bocce balls... Bring appetites. My chili, and I'll get some fine steaks from my butcher as well as super burgers also.   BYOB.   Bring a chair and a dish to share.  Music and games on hand.

Signup by thursday 9/27 so i will know how much meat to purchase at the butcher.. only good meat sees my grill... a nice way to end summer.  depending on weather we can go inside, see whats up.
item.name: Bike ride Cranston to W Warwick, BBQ at my house
